original_text: And when he came to Samaria, he struck down all who remained to Ahab in Samaria, till he had wiped them out, according to the word of the Lord that he spoke to Elijah.
korean_text: 사마리아에 이르러 거기에 남아 있는 바 아합에게 속한 자들을 죽여 진멸하였으니 여호와께서 엘리야에게 이르신 말씀과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: And when he came to Samaria,
he struck down all who remained to Ahab in Samaria,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사마리아에 남아있던 아합에게 속한 모든 자를 쳐죽였고,

sentences.original_text: till he had wiped them out,
according to the word of the Lord that he spoke to Elijah.
